name: Room Labyrinth
description:
You are just in your office, getting around this place is such a hassle, I hope you can stay busy at your computer during your whole shift.

Controls
Move: WASD or Arrows
Run: Hold Left Shift
Crouch: Hold Left Ctrl

An original game built for the  Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 with its development streamed on Youtube and Twitch.
